lenders.name: Jay
lenders.loan_because: That's just the way I am.
lenders.occupational_info: I like to think of myself as a Humanitarian.

lenders.name: Anthony
lenders.loan_because: It helps other people improve their lives.

lenders.name: Alexander Burke
lenders.loan_because: Microcredit has been proven to improve the world one small business at a time.
lenders.occupational_info: I design, support, maintain, and fix computer systems that help run schools, businesses, universities, and governments.

lenders.name: Dee
lenders.loan_because: The best answer I've seen for this is the man who said "Because I can." Travel reminds me how wealthy we lucky few are compared to so many people in developing countries. It's a time in my life (retirement) to  "do something." This is an amazing concept in action. Brilliantly  simple and incredibly powerful.
lenders.occupational_info: I worked many years in natural resource management with the Alaska Department of Natural Resources. For the last 15 years I worked with Alaska Native Corporations on land planning projects.

lenders.name: Ivan

I want to help. Everybody needs help.

Mucha suerte para todos.

lenders.occupational_info: I work in outside plant Telecommunications construction.

lenders.name: Byron
lenders.loan_because: Hola mi nombre es Byron Jácome Z. tengo 28 años y necesito un prestamo para la creación de un centro educativo dentro del mercado electrónico, donde se brindará la enseñanaza de comecialización de negocios dentro de la internet, la cuál permitira a las personas expandir sus negocios y crear negocios, mejorando asi su productividad y calidad de vida. Cuento con una estrucura propia pero no con el capital de que requiero para la adecuación y maquinaria necesaria para empezar este gran proyecto solidario ya que con una minima inversión de 5 mensual las personas podrán aprender a mejorar sus negocios con grandes resultados. El prestamo que requiero es de 5.000,00
lenders.occupational_info: Soy una persona que busca que cada persona en este planeta tenga la oportunidad de mejorar su estilo de vida y gozar de todas sus bondades.

lenders.name: Helen
lenders.loan_because: I think it is a good way to help people and I especially like to help people in Ukraine, because that is where my parents were born.

lenders.name: B&B + 5
lenders.loan_because: It's a pleasure to help others help themselves.

lenders.name: Alejandro
lenders.loan_because: I want to do a company that helps the people of my country to be organized and to develop better, a company with a clear and objective vision
lenders.occupational_info: Public relationist, entrusted to create the managerial image and corporate communicator

lenders.name: DiAnn & Jose
lenders.loan_because: My husband and I remember all of the times that we needed extra money to get through in life.  Now that we have a little extra, we are passing it on.
lenders.occupational_info: Jose is a self-employed painting contractor and I work as a school secretary at our son's elementary school.

lenders.name: Lori
lenders.loan_because: I was lucky enough to be born in the USA.  Becuase of this I have an easy life, free of the stress that those in other countires face on a daily basis.  All my needs and wants are met.  My husband and I have raised 3 chidlren and have 9 grandchildren.  It is time for me to help others who are not as lucky as I.
lenders.occupational_info: I work as a nurse on a labor and delivery unit at a hospital.  I assist women giving birth and help them learn to feed and care for their baby after the birth.

lenders.name: Mike
lenders.loan_because: It's a great way to help people help themselves!
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a husband, father of two and an elementary school principal.  So, basically, I spend all my time playing with kids!  Pretty cool gig.

lenders.name: roger
lenders.loan_because: I can

lenders.name: Kristine
lenders.loan_because: I like to help people that need the help and are willing to work for a better life vs. wanting a handout.

lenders.name: Jackie
lenders.occupational_info: I work with children who need extra help in the classroom.  Most are autistic or have behavior problems.  My job is behavior intervention.

lenders.name: Don & Tina

lenders.occupational_info: We take people on outdoor adventures.

lenders.name: Emily

lenders.name: Vic & Mary

lenders.occupational_info: Retirement to us is being free to live some lifelong dreams and being able to give something back.

lenders.name: Diana
lenders.loan_because: I have a need to assist others in their personal success.

lenders.name: James
lenders.loan_because: I want to help.
lenders.occupational_info: I  work in law enforcement for the government.

lenders.name: graciela

lenders.occupational_info: my job is help people to buy or sell homes.

lenders.loan_because: I know what it means to need a helping hand.  I'm trying to decrease world suck! DFTBA!

lenders.name: Lizzie P

lenders.occupational_info: I am a driver/courier for Fedex.  In my free time I race bicycles.

lenders.name: melissa

lenders.name: Kissa

lenders.name: Kurt and Evy
lenders.loan_because: Kurt's eldest son,Tor, showed us how we could send our dreams for people who struggle out into the world.
lenders.occupational_info: Kurt is a middle school teacher helping 100 middle school children from all over the world each year learn English so they can become successful. Evy is a comptroller for a small company in Oregon. Evy and I write and support poetry that is accessible, useful and enjoyable; each poem is, in a way, a micro-dream. With Poetspeak we support ordinary people anywhere put words to their dreams, fears and hopes.

lenders.name: Susan
lenders.loan_because: I was once a struggling single parent, and I know the courage it takes to work your way out of tough times.
lenders.occupational_info: I am an editor; I help writers with their books by correcting writing and grammar errors and suggesting changes that clarify their stories.

lenders.name: Ryan
lenders.loan_because: The sum of many small actions can do great things.

lenders.name: Glen
lenders.loan_because: I can!

lenders.name: Laura & Ryan
lenders.loan_because: We have been blessed. We want to be good stewards with what God has so generously given to us. It's not okay for us to sit back and do nothing to help others. God wants us to be his hands and feet to meet the needs of people around the world. We believe everybody deserve a chance to build a better life for themelves and their families, and what a great way to help!

lenders.name: Diane
lenders.loan_because: Life is better with sharing.
lenders.occupational_info: My former clients had severe mental illness, such as schizophrenia.  They have had hard lives and many failures, so one of the most important things I help them with is building self-respect, to feel that their lives are worth living even though they have mental illness.

lenders.occupational_info: Help for elderly with paper work and regulations

lenders.occupational_info: We're a group of friends that get together every month, each of us put in some money and together we choose projects we invest in. Meanwhile we eat cookies ("Kakbank" means "Cookie bank" in Swedish) and enjoy each others company!

lenders.loan_because: Entrepreneurs are awesome and need support!  They will change their world - and the world.

lenders.name: Jean-Marie Vailloud
lenders.loan_because:
"No man is an Iland, intire of it selfe; every man is a peece of the Continent, a part of the maine; if a Clod bee washed away by the Sea, Europe is the lesse, as well as if a Promontorie were, as well as if a Mannor of thy friends or of thine own were; any mans death diminishes me, because I am involved in Mankinde; And therefore never send to know for whom the bell tolls; It tolls for thee."

En français:

« Aucun homme n’est une île, un tout, complet en soi ; tout homme est un fragment du continent, une partie de l’ensemble ; si la mer emporte une motte de terre, l’Europe en est amoindrie, comme si les flots avaient emporté un promontoire, le manoir de tes amis ou le tien ; la mort de tout homme me diminue, parce que j’appartiens au genre humain ; aussi n’envoie jamais demander pour qui sonne le glas : c’est pour toi qu’il sonne »

John Donne (1572-1631)

lenders.name: Jeroen
lenders.loan_because: the idea of  "micro credit" is a constructive way of helping those in need. Plus I'm convinced Kiva is a reliable organisation which I can trust my money to.

lenders.name: David
lenders.loan_because: Kiva connects me directly to people whose lives will be improved by small loans.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach people how to map the seafloor.  My students have come from 57 countries.

lenders.name: janice
lenders.loan_because: I read a quote once by Mother Theresa which in essence said "just begin". We all worry and feel sad of the state of things in our world and become immobolized because we don't know where to begin. This statement motivated me to "just begin" one person, one child at a time. I know eventually if we all just take that leap of faith and reach out, even if it is to one person, it will make a difference!
lenders.occupational_info: teacher of young children ages 3-5 years old

lenders.name: Mark
lenders.loan_because: I think it's great that these people are showing the initiative to be entrepreneurs in a difficult situation.  It's the least I can do to help them out to get a start, or improve their situation.  One person at a time, we will change the world for the better.

lenders.name: Virginia

lenders.loan_because: I like the fact that a dollar amount that is small to me can make a life-changing difference to the loan recipient.
lenders.occupational_info: I work at an private school in Boston, MA USA

lenders.name: Evelyn
lenders.loan_because: What a way to improve life and be a presence in many parts of a world made better by socially-minded bunch..... lending with no strings attached.
lenders.occupational_info: I watch my grandchildren (now 5 and 3 year old boys) grow, hopefully to be responsible citizens of this world.

lenders.name: Prism CGI
lenders.loan_because: Our company wants to give back to our local community and to the world-wide community - to help people provide and support their families and change their communities.  Our CEO flew food and medicine into Ethiopia during the 1980's and he has seen this idea work - our company now helps others help themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: We install and fix computer servers and networks to help people do business more efficiently.  Our company motto is: "Productivity without a foundation of ethics...means nothing."  We believe it and we live it.

lenders.name: The Zimmerman Family
lenders.loan_because: this is an opportunity to make a difference.

lenders.name: Belfi Family
lenders.loan_because: We believe that we should give back to the community since we have been very fortunate in life so far.

lenders.name: Tim
lenders.loan_because: because I'm interested in how micro-lending works in the real world
lenders.occupational_info: I help low-to-moderate income people buy homes in Dayton, Ohio in the United States.

lenders.name: AMIN
lenders.loan_because: It's our duty ...

lenders.name: Ryan, Tonya, Isabella and Will
lenders.loan_because: We are very fortunate to be able to give back to the many people of the world. We hope our modest contribution helps.

lenders.name: Ramona
lenders.loan_because: It makes me feel more connected to the world.  Because I believe in the businesses.  Because I want to be part of the solution.

lenders.name: Paula
lenders.loan_because: people need help.

lenders.name: Emily
lenders.loan_because: every act of kindness helps
lenders.occupational_info: I work with families who have a child with a disability.

lenders.name: Valarie
lenders.loan_because: It makes me happy.

lenders.name: HECTOR
lenders.loan_because: I want to help those less fortunate than myself. I am very grateful for what I have and I want to make a difference. If your not part of the solution-then your part of the problem.
lenders.occupational_info: I repair public telephones in NYC.

lenders.name: Chad and Christy
lenders.loan_because: We learned of Kiva through our diocese a few years ago.  We are committed to the ONE Episcopalian and MDG's developed by UN and this is one way for us to help our global neighbor achieve a better future.

lenders.name: Chris
lenders.loan_because: I loan because I believe micro lending is a great way to help reduce poverty across the globe.

lenders.name: Tiffany
lenders.loan_because: I believe in Peter Singer's writings concerning an individual's responsibility in working towards alleviating global poverty.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a double-major in Psychology and Sociology.

lenders.name: Nathan
lenders.loan_because: It gets resources directly to worthy folks around the world  - a powerful and important concept.
lenders.occupational_info: We help youth and adults think about, talk about and "do" money in ways that honor their values.

lenders.name: Jonathan
lenders.loan_because: Everyone deserves a chance to succeed if they work hard.
lenders.occupational_info: Motorcycle service and online parts sales

lenders.name: Ian Tyndall
lenders.loan_because: The Tyndall Foundation was formed to transfer the proceeds from an aggressively managed options trading portfolio into a diversified lending program that provides for opportunities in lesser developed countries.
lenders.occupational_info: The Tyndall Foundation closely watches global economic trends to identify investment opportunities that yield 50% or greater returns on investment.  15% of the annual profit from options trading is invested in microlending.

lenders.name: Chris
lenders.loan_because: I like the idea that money I loan will help someone become successful in a business. More business opportunity will lead to a more peaceful world.
lenders.occupational_info: I am the publisher of a small magazine owned by a large company in New York. Most of our revenue is generated by advertising sales.

lenders.name: Jennifer & Ben
lenders.loan_because: It's the right thing to do!  Our resources are blessings and should be used to help those in need.  Plus, it feels good to give to deserving people.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach social studies to 6th grade students.  My husband helps people buy and sell houses.  We love to travel during the summer together and see other parts of the word.

lenders.name: Philip
lenders.loan_because: Many people have helped me at various points in my life.  It's nice to be able to help out other people.
lenders.occupational_info: I help people learn to use computer programs.

lenders.name: Mike Horrocks
lenders.loan_because: We should all be of one heart, of one mind, and there should be no poor among us.
lenders.occupational_info: By day, I help banks be more efficient.  By night, I help change the world one micro-opportunity at a time.

lenders.name: Andreas
lenders.loan_because: ...intelligent and novel ways of helping others really appeals to me!
lenders.occupational_info: I work as an Environmental Engineer specialized in hazardous waste management.

lenders.name: Shaina
lenders.loan_because: I believe with a little financial help anyone with motivation and talent can succeed.  Many people just don't have the financial opportunity that many of us have enjoyed. Kiva enables us to help others become successful and be able to support their family and community.
lenders.occupational_info: I privately teach needle arts to many different people who love to create clothing.  Instead of celebrating holidays this year with gifts and presents, we are instead loaning the money we would have spent to provide Kiva loans to people engaged in any activity related to clothing construction.

lenders.name: Nelia
lenders.loan_because: I respect people who are trying to make their own way in the world, especially when they are working with few resources and are still determined and optimistic.  It is a pleasure to be able to help.

lenders.name: COM100AB Phoenix College
lenders.occupation: Intro to Human Comm class at Phoenix College
lenders.loan_because: We hope to change lives and make a difference in the world. We want to give others the chance to accomplish their dreams through help with the expansion of their business.
lenders.occupational_info: We are not just making loans. We are helping enrich the world.

lenders.name: Martin
lenders.occupational_info: soy trabajor independiente

lenders.name: COM100 Phoenix College
lenders.occupation: Intro to Comm class Phoenix College
lenders.loan_because: We wish to facilitate individuals as a way to motivate and encourage them to embrace the opportunity of a better tomorrow for themselves and their families.
lenders.occupational_info: We are microlenders. It is a tool that helps others by allowing them to help themselves. Through microlending, the entrepreneurs are responsible to repay their loans, making them feel more empowered and creates a sense of self-accomplishment.

lenders.name: Lynda
lenders.loan_because: It feels good to give

lenders.name: george
lenders.loan_because: I have been blessed and would like to help others in need.
lenders.occupational_info: I make dirty water safe and clean for my community to drink. I run the water plant that sends the water out to my township for drinking.

lenders.name: Jagannath
lenders.loan_because: Many helped me by investing in me. I hope I can help more people and see the joy of helping one another.
lenders.occupational_info: Software developer and real estate investor

lenders.name: Pearl
lenders.loan_because: I can.  I have been helped by the generosity of others and this is my way of giving back.

lenders.name: Scott
lenders.loan_because: Access to capital is nearly impossible for these people otherwise.  A tiny investment can literally change a person's life and at the same time positively impact their community.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with images and ideas.

lenders.name: Suzy
lenders.occupation: non profit NPR Radio sales director

lenders.name: K Diane
lenders.loan_because:
I want to help people across the world start or build their small businesses.  I wish everyone the best of success,

 Quiero ayudar gente por todo el mundo a comenzar y construir sus negócios.  Espero que les vaya muy bien.
lenders.occupational_info: I am retired from my government job.  I now manage house rentals.  I also raise horses and chickens on my small farm.

lenders.name: Kevin
lenders.loan_because: I believe in Kiva.org and am committed to unrelentingly pursuing the advancement of social justice for all.
lenders.occupational_info: I help prison-involved individuals who are homeless, with mental health issues that have severe drug and alcohol problems. I also started and serve as the director of a homeless youth shelter for lesbian, gay, bisexual and transgender youth in New York City (www.trinityplaceshelter.org)

lenders.name: Nahid Harjee
lenders.loan_because: all entrepreneurs deserve an equal chance.
lenders.occupational_info: I make really small sensors.

lenders.name: Sarah
lenders.loan_because: I am blessed to be a blessing. Generosity and sharing with those less fortunate is a Biblical command I strongly adhere to. I very much want to be a good steward of the resources that God has entrusted to me, and I believe that we should do that in a way that does not create a sense of dependency or demean those on the "recieving" end. I love the concept of micro-loaning as it empowers people, often breaks a long cycle of poverty, and is a gift that keeps on giving. THANK YOU KIVA for your brilliant model.
lenders.occupational_info: I work at a large Christian church focused on loving God and serving our neighbors, both locally and globally. My daily goals are to connect the members of our congregation with opportunities to meet the needs of the poor, thereby modeling Jesus Christ and making His name known around the world.

lenders.name: Jeanvieve
lenders.loan_because: I know what it's like to be in a position where $25 at the right moment can change everything.

lenders.name: Tray and Jenny
lenders.loan_because: After hearing about kiva.org, it just seemed like a simple way to reach out and love people we dont even know.  Reading their stories, you can hear the desire to take care of their families, which is really a basic desire we all have.  The small amount these folks need to actually make a difference in their lives is staggering.
lenders.occupational_info:
I am a pastor at a church plant in Austin Texas. Our desire as a church, is to be defined by how we love God and others.
Matthew 25:40 The King will reply, 'I tell you the truth, whatever you did for one of the least of these brothers of mine, you did for me.'

lenders.name: Het
lenders.loan_because: everyone deserves the right to make a better life for themselves, their families and their communities

lenders.name: Joan
lenders.loan_because: I can help someone's dream come true!

lenders.name: Vipul
lenders.loan_because: it is very satisfying to be able to make a meaningful difference in a fellow human being's life.

lenders.name: Kirstee and Ashly
lenders.loan_because: we loan because we are fulfilling our dreams and we want other people to have the opportunity to fulfill theirs :-)
lenders.occupational_info: Kirstee is a stay-at-home mum and Ashly is a steel fixer

lenders.name: Luk
lenders.loan_because:
I am concerned about poor people in poor countries, and because I am worried about the environment. 
Our way of living must change, we need to do something.

lenders.name: Daniel Ahiakpor
lenders.loan_because: I want to help provide the facilities needed for us to do great things in this wonderful world we share.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in sales & business development for Adap.tv and study at NYU's Stern School of Business.

lenders.name: Sandra
lenders.loan_because: I feel it is a good and sensible way to support another person in need. It is direct and personal.
lenders.occupational_info: I advise banks in business issues, mostly IT or process related

lenders.name: Nasra, Oman
lenders.loan_because: I want to help others who are in need.

lenders.name: Pauline
lenders.loan_because: I see it as a constructive way to enable people.  Rather than just providing  'band-aid' assistance it actually empowers people.
lenders.occupational_info: I work closely with not-for-profit disability organisations.

lenders.name: Steven
lenders.loan_because: Microloaning helps others to help themselves...

lenders.name: Ann
lenders.loan_because: I can spare a bit that other people desperately need...

lenders.name: Serene
lenders.loan_because: I believe that this idea works
lenders.occupational_info: I work in the Communications deprtment of an audit and accounting firm and also work actively on corporate social responsibility initiatives in the Middle East

lenders.name: Melissa
lenders.loan_because: I believe that everybody deserves a beautiful life for himself and for his family. But many people can't do it by themselves, they need some support. I believe that we should help these people to make their dreams come true.
lenders.occupational_info: Student French-Spanish

lenders.name: Lisbeth G-N
lenders.loan_because: I love the concept; it's just so easy sitting at home making a little difference. I'd like to think that it matters to the entrepreneurs that people around the world actually cares.
lenders.occupational_info: Have been a social worker among young people most of my adult life, now working at a psykiatric home.

lenders.name: Cathy
lenders.loan_because: I would like to see children from all over the world have the same opportunities my children have

lenders.name: Michael Day
lenders.loan_because: I love to lend a hand and...I believe that Kiva is one of the finest ways anyone can break the trance of restrictions while the planet makes its way through its financial crisis. If someone tells me they just lost their job, I often respond by suggesting that they immediately fund one person on Kiva and experience the remarkable empowerment that comes from this.
lenders.occupational_info: I love to work towards world peace by helping anyone end the war within. I also love to ask people questions that invite them to discover that Life is nowhere near as limited as they thought it was often just a moment before!

lenders.name: Amanda
lenders.loan_because: I believe that if you live a blessed life in a prosperous society, it is your duty to give back and help up those that aren't as lucky. As human beings, we're all the same and I think it's our responsibility to help those who can't help themselves. "With great power comes great responsibility." -Spiderman

lenders.name: Patrice
lenders.loan_because: I can afford it and I like the idea that my little contribution can make somone in need's life better.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm developing softwares that help in aircraft maintenance.

lenders.name: inge
lenders.loan_because: I can

lenders.name: Iesha
lenders.loan_because: Throughout life there were helping hands that lifted me up.  I now want to pay it forward.
lenders.occupational_info: I sell electricity to non-deregulated areas.

lenders.name: Iain
lenders.occupation: Academic tutor/amateur chicken and bee keeper
lenders.loan_because: Its just a really easy way to do something worthwhile.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for a leading Scottish charity which supports people with learning disabilities to access the sort of opportunities others take for granted.

lenders.name: Susan
lenders.loan_because: Everyone deserves a chance to be self-supporting and successful. We live in abudance in the U.S. and it's a privilege to be able to share the wealth.
lenders.occupational_info: I keep our computers, printers and network working. Our computers are connected to each other through the network so we can share information.

lenders.name: Said
lenders.occupational_info: I need some money for begining my improve work who i can produce much positions. thanks

lenders.name: Greg & Cheryl

lenders.occupational_info: Greg is a retired law enforcement officer. Cheryl is a judge.

lenders.name: Rob
lenders.loan_because: Make the world a better place!

lenders.name: Darren
lenders.loan_because: At one time or another we've all needed help.

lenders.name: Lisa and Mike
lenders.loan_because: Sometime we all need a little help to follow our dreams and do good in this world.

lenders.name: Bpt 7th grade
lenders.loan_because: This is service project for our class.
lenders.occupational_info: Students and teachers in the 7th grade.

lenders.name: Rebecca
lenders.loan_because:
Jesus has blessed me so that I can be a blessing to others - spreading His glory throughout the world.

"For you know the grace of our Lord Jesus Christ, that though he was rich, yet for your sake he became poor, so that you by his poverty might become rich." ~ 2 Corinthians 8:9
lenders.occupational_info: I teach Elementary school.

lenders.name: Juan
lenders.occupation: Asesor de Proyecto/Estudiante de Comunicacion Soc
lenders.loan_because: For sales of bedding, towels and clothing in general and to raise funds and support to the foundation with the profits
lenders.occupational_info: Working coordinator of the Foundation Refuge House of God Venezuela, in the city of Merida Venezuela, to help children, girls, the problem of disability and comprehensive care for children in extreme poverty, and we have no support from the state

lenders.name: ryan
lenders.loan_because: I aspire to be a loan shark when I grow up. This seems like good practice.

lenders.occupational_info: We are Realtors and represent buyers and sellers in the purchase and sale of homes.

lenders.name: michael
lenders.loan_because: It does something. Microfinance is not the solution, but it does bring developed and developing nations together. It gives people who want to work the chance they don't have otherwise. it gives those in developing countries access to capital they would never have
lenders.occupational_info: I run the technology department of a small art supply company.

lenders.name: María del Carmen
lenders.loan_because: Yo necesito el crédito porque en el momento estoy en el montaje de un taller para la producción de artesanias específicamente ilumanación.
lenders.occupational_info: Nuestra empresa fue creada para ser un puente de comercialización de los artesanos y es un ejemplo a nivel nacional e internacional, tenemos una tienda virtual que ofrece todos los productos que elaboran nuestros artesanas y artesanas.

lenders.name: Pedro F. Lebre
lenders.loan_because: I believe that giving people a chance to succeed is an important step that is often overlooked when trying to find solutions to end poverty. I feel that lending money helps build sustainable communities in developing countries. I want to support economic growth rather than provide charity.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a full-time student of History and Education as well as a great Portuguese-American.

lenders.name: Albert & Dawn
lenders.loan_because: Having spent time in Southeast Asia I am constantly amazed with the spirit of the people. So many of them are working to support their families under conditions most Americans could not fathom.

lenders.name: Gary
lenders.loan_because: I Like to help others
lenders.occupational_info: Making it E-Z for millions

lenders.name: Terry
lenders.loan_because: a friend of mine gave me a kiva gift certificate.  What a great idea!

once someone gave me a loan that saved me. 
You own something as soon as you can give it away.
lenders.occupational_info: I help people to find them self

lenders.name: Sten

lenders.occupational_info: Assisting compagnies, teams and individuals in their effort to change and grow.

lenders.name: dan

lenders.occupational_info: In charge of landscape maintenance for 2 community colleges.

lenders.name: PATRICIA
lenders.loan_because: I AM AN ENTREPRENEUR AND I WANT TO HELP PEOPLE WHO NEED TO START THEIR BUSINESSES IN COUNTRIES WHERE IT IS MUCH HARDER TO GET FUNDING.
lenders.occupational_info: OUR COMPANY COMPOUNDS AND SELLS PLASTIC RAW MATERIALS FROM WHICH OUR CUSTOMERS MAKE A WIDE VARIETY OF PRODUCTS.

lenders.name: Paula
lenders.loan_because: working together we can build a  much better world....

lenders.name: Hope

To be able to make a difference in someone else's life means a lot to me.  It is the right thing to do! "If there is any kindness or good thing I can do for my fellow being, let me do it now.  For I shall pass this way but once." W.C. Gannett
lenders.occupational_info: Now that I am retired, I spend my leisure time with my family and my many, many friends.  I also enjoy gardening, reading, photography and my two precious little dogs, Daisie and Teddy Dash Bear.

lenders.occupational_info: As a designer I create a mixture of images and words on a computer in a way that is artistic but comunicates a message. lenders.name: kate

lenders.name: Andy

lenders.loan_because: I believe in the power of the entrepreneurial spirit.  I believe that the drive and passion of an entrepreneur is the force that will change one community at a time and thereby change the world
lenders.occupational_info: There is nothing that I am more convince of than the power of Good People and Great Opportunities.  Combining the two can and has led to the greatest advancements in the world and will continue to do so.  I want to be a part of that and have built my network and my world to provide that opportunity.

lenders.name: Milton
lenders.loan_because: A kind friend gave me 50 dollars to get started with Kiva and I've been talking about it ever since. It matters to me that my help connects directly with someone who needs it.
lenders.occupational_info: I am exploring how we might design better institutions for the future by combining ideas with smart delivery.

lenders.loan_because: I want to help

lenders.loan_because: i can

lenders.name: Steve
lenders.loan_because: Loaning money to people is a way to help others survive and provide for their families. These are people that seem to be working very hard to achieve a goal in their life that they are working towards. I ran my own contracting business for 17 years and know how hard it is to survive as a self employed entrepreneur.
lenders.occupational_info: I currently write software for use in the Animal Health Care industry. I have written software and designed hardware for various applications including laboratory robotics, nuclear medicine, and human pharmaceutical development.

lenders.name: Lucenda
lenders.occupation: Massage therapist / Owner of Hariatie, Praktijk voor Massagetherapie
lenders.loan_because: This is my contribution for a better world.
